word_mean: 压迫，压缩：物体因外力作用而使其体积减小、密度增大的倾向
发育期缩短：胚胎学中，指发育期间某些阶段的缩短或缺如
杆件或单元体的两端平面上受到法向均布压力而产生沿压力方向的缩短现象。
把信号动态范围缩小的操作。

sentence.Network_en: The compression and density make this a difficult book to read, but it richly rewards the effort.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书内容丰富，思想深刻，很难读懂，但是非常值得一读。

sentence.Network_en: This compression is not dissipated by agents.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一浓缩作用不会被药剂所消除。

sentence.Network_en: A gas is cooled by expansion and heated by compression.
sentence.Network_cn: 气体膨胀时冷却,压缩时变热.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin compressio(n-), from comprimere 'press together' (see compress)

entry.def: When you compress something or when it compresses, it is pressed or squeezed so that it takes up less space.

example.ex: Poor posture, sitting or walking slouched over, compresses the body's organs...
example.tran: 坐着或者走路的时候低头垂肩，这种不正确的姿势会压迫体内的器官。

example.ex: Air will compress but the brake fluid won't.
example.tran: 空气会压缩，但是刹车油不会。

entry.def: If you compress something such as a piece of writing or a description, you make it shorter.

example.ex: He never understood how to organize or compress large masses of material...
example.tran: 他从来就不懂如何对大篇的材料进行整理或精简。

example.ex: All those three books are compacted and compressed into one book.
example.tran: 那三本书的内容全都压缩进一本书了。

entry.def: If an event is compressed into a short space of time, it is given less time to happen than normal or previously.

example.ex: The four debates will be compressed into an unprecedentedly short eight-day period...
example.tran: 这4场辩论将被压缩到短短8天的时间，这是前所未有的。

example.ex: Some courses such as engineering had to be compressed.
example.tran: 有些课程，比如工程学，必须减少课时。

entry.def: A compress is a pad of wet or dry cloth pressed on part of a patient's body to reduce fever.

example.ex: Sore throats may be relieved by cold compresses.
example.tran: 喉咙痛用冷敷布敷一下可能会好一些。

means.word_mean: 1. an increase in the density of something
2. the process or result of becoming smaller or pressed together;

sentences.sentence: "the contraction of a gas on cooling"

means.word_mean: 3. encoding information while reducing the bandwidth or bits required

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去
